class.name: DojoEnum
class.brief_description: Represents an enum value from a Dojo contract.
class.description: This class holds the name, selected option, and value of an enum from a Dojo contract. It's used to represent enum variants. When printed, it will output the string representation of the current enum option.

method.name: get_name
method.description: Returns the name of the enum type.

method.name: get_option
method.description: Returns the index of the selected enum option.

method.name: get_value
method.description: Returns the value associated with the enum variant. This can be of any type, including another struct or enum.

method.name: set_name
method.description: Sets the name of the enum type.

method.name: set_value
method.description: Sets the value of the enum variant.

method.name: to_string
method.description: Returns the name of the selected enum option as a string.
